name: Baker & McKenzie Partnerschaft von Rechtsanwälten, Wirtschaftsprüfern und Steuerberatern mbB
legal: Partnerschaft von Rechtsanwälten, Wirtschaftsprüfern und Steuerberatern mbB
goal:
Baker & McKenzie DE is one of the leading law firms and advises national and international companies on all aspects of commercial and tax law. In doing so, we concentrate on understanding the economic background while remaining focused on the realization of the business goals of our clients.

According to professional standards, our advice to clients is protected by confidentiality rules.

We provide expertise in the following practice areas: Antitrust & Trade, Banking & Finance, Compliance, Corporate/M&A, Litigation/Arbitration, Information Technology, Intellectual Property, Employment, Pharma, Public Law, Tax, Trade & Commerce.
interests: Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Internal Market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Our collaboration with the European Commission consists in dialogue, interaction and communication. We monitor policy initiatives of various government agencies and update our clients on EU activities in all areas, from agriculture to transport.
